Author: O_O--ohboy
Text: An incredible amount of money is spent every year to ensure that people feel insecure about themselves because then it is profitable to sell solutions (gym memberships, detoxes, diets, etc) which is why everyone we all know is obsessed with weight loss. We're just obsessed in a different way. I'm sorry you're feeling triggered. It's been a difficult thing for me understand that normalizing starving and telling people around me that I'm fine, and eating and healthy is very invalidating and probably triggering to them. As a society, this is something we need to work on. (((((HUG))))))
